bibliographic-data.invention-title: INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD AND ELECTRONIC MONEY SYSTEM

nplcit.text: 5500--FDIC General Counsel's Opinion No. 8--Stored Value Cards, 61 Fed. Reg. 40490, http://www.fdic.gov/regulations/laws/rules/5500-500.html, Aug. 2, 1996

abstract.p: The present invention relates to an information processing method and an electronic money system that achieve contribution to the realization of a global or social objective, such as protection of global environment, by using the characteristics of electronic money, which is money, a point, or a right of use represented by electronic data. When an electronic money card 10 is presented to an electronic money interface 27, a controller 24 detects, by using a use/use status detection unit 31, the use of the electronic money card 10 and the time and place at which the electronic money card 10 is used. In a case where the use or the like is in line with an objective such as protection of global environment or social contribution because the use is purchase or use of a commercial product or a service which meets certain conditions and for which saving of resources or energy is achieved, the controller 24 performs processing for increasing the value of electronic money. Increasing the value is making a discount, increasing the balance, providing a point, or increasing a range in which the right of use can be granted.

PROCÉDÉ DE TRAITEMENT D'INFORMATIONS ET SYSTÈME D'ARGENT ÉLECTRONIQUE

abstract.p: The present invention relates to an information processing method and an electronic money system that achieve contribution to the realization of a global or social objective, such as protection of global environment, by using the characteristics of electronic money, which is money, a point, or a right of use represented by electronic data. When an electronic money card 10 is presented to an electronic money interface 27, a controller 24 detects, by using a use/use status detection unit 31, the use of the electronic money card 10 and the time and place at which the electronic money card 10 is used.

In a case where the use or the like is in line with an objective such as protection of global environment or social contribution because the use is purchase or use of a commercial product or a service which meets certain conditions and for which saving of resources or energy is achieved, the controller 24 performs processing for increasing the value of electronic money. Increasing the value is making a discount, increasing the balance, providing a point, or increasing a range in which the right of use can be granted.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD AND ELECTRONIC MONEY SYSTEM
PROCÉDÉ DE TRAITEMENT D'INFORMATIONS ET SYSTÈME D'ARGENT ÉLECTRONIQUE
INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD AND TERMINAL EQUIPMENT

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To contribute to the terrestrial or social purpose such as the protection of earth environment by using the characteristics of electronic money as money, points or a use right represented by electronic data.

SOLUTION: When an electronic money card 10 is presented to an electronic money interface 27, a controller 24 detects the purpose of use, time and place by a purpose of use/use circumstance detection part 31, and executes processing to increase the value of the electronic money when the purpose of use follows the purpose of the protection of an earth environment or social contribution just like the purpose or use is the purchase of merchandise or a service integrated into power saving or energy saving satisfying fixed conditions. The increase of the value is achieved by performing discount, increasing a balance, applying points, and enlarging the available range of the use right. When the environment such as air conditioning temperature or the act of moving speed of the user follows the purpose of the protection of the earth environment, the similar processing is executed.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD AND ELECTRONIC MONEY SYSTEM

abstract.p: An information processing method and an electronic money system enabling contribution to realizing global or social purposes such as protection of the earth environment by utilizing the characteristics of electronic money which is money expressed by electronic data, points, or the right of use. When an electronic money card (10) is presented to an electronic money interface (27), a controller (24) detects the usage, time, and place through a usage used state detecting section (31). If the usage fits the purpose of protection of the earth environment or social contribution, for example, if the usage is purchase of a commodity or use of a service both of which involve resource saving or energy saving satisfying predetermined conditions, the controller (24) carries out a processing of increasing the value of the electronic money. The increase of the value includes discount, an increase of the balance, addition of points, or expansion of the usable range of the right of use.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD AND ELECTRONIC MONEY SYSTEM
PROCÉDÉ DE TRAITEMENT D'INFORMATIONS ET SYSTÈME D'ARGENT ÉLECTRONIQUE

nplcit.text: 'Chiiki Koken Katsudo ya Kaigo Yobo Koza de Point Fuyo Koreisha no Chiiki Katsudo Sanka ni PASMO o Katsuyo Setagaya-Ku' CARDWAVE vol. 20, no. 4, 20 March 2007, page 49, XP008142137

abstract.p: An information processing method and an electronic money system enabling contribution to realizing global or social purposes such as protection of the earth environment by utilizing the characteristics of electronic money which is money expressed by electronic data, points, or the right of use. When an electronic money card (10) is presented to an electronic money interface (27), a controller (24) detects the usage, time, and place through a usage used state detecting section (31). If the usage fits the purpose of protection of the earth environment or social contribution, for example, if the usage is purchase of a commodity or use of a service both of which involve resource saving or energy saving satisfying predetermined conditions, the controller (24) carries out a processing of increasing the value of the electronic money. The increase of the value includes discount, an increase of the balance, addition of points, or expansion of the usable range of the right of use.

Procédé de traitement d'informations et système d'argent électronique permettant de contribuer à la réalisation d'objectifs d'ordre mondial ou social, tels que la protection de l'environnement, en utilisant les caractéristiques de l'argent électronique, qui est de l'argent sous forme de données électroniques, de points, ou de droit d'utilisation. Lorsqu'une carte d'argent électronique (10) est présentée à une interface d'argent électronique (27), un contrôleur (24) détecte l'utilisation, l'heure et le lieu par le biais d'une section détection d'état utilisé d'utilisation (31).

Si l'utilisation convient à l'objectif de protection de l'environnement ou de contribution sociale, par exemple, si l'utilisation est l'achat d'un produit ou l'utilisation d'un service, les deux impliquant des économies de ressources ou d'énergie qui satisfont des conditions prédéterminées, le contrôleur (24) effectue un traitement consistant à augmenter la valeur de l'argent électronique. L'augmentation de la valeur comprend une remise, une augmentation du solde, l'ajout de points ou l'extension du cadre d'utilisation du droit d'utilisation.
